Articles.Content: Lately I have been trying to install the Astronomer's Visual Pack, but It's not working. I'm using copied local files from my steam download to help me try mods before I put them into my purchased game. I may be putting them in the wrong folders. Please just let me know what folders I need to put the game data in!
Your mod file or folder goes in the GameData folder, not in the squad subfolder, also what version of KSP are you using?
